rt.films

Class BoxFilterFilm

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.films.BoxFilterFilm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Film

    public class BoxFilterFilm
extends java.lang.Object
implements Film
    Uses a box filter when accumulating samples on a film. A box filter means that samples contribute only to the pixel that they lie in. Sample values are simply averaged.
